db:abstract.db:para: Shows how to use Qt D-Bus to control a car from another application.

db:article.db:programlisting: <!DOCTYPE node PUBLIC "-//freedesktop//DTD D-BUS Object Introspection 1.0//EN" "http://www.freedesktop.org/standards/dbus/1.0/introspect.dtd"> <node name="/com/trollech/examples/car"> <interface name="org.example.Examples.CarInterface"> <method name="accelerate"/> <method name="decelerate"/> <method name="turnLeft"/> <method name="turnRight"/> <signal name="crashed"/> </interface> </node>
